divs: sighting detailsi was sitting with my kids and we were watching tv,and my wife came in and said "*(wit's name deleted--cms\sg) come and see this"! i was like "what"! she said "theres a ufo in the sky"! so i grabbed my video cam and came outside and was kinda shocked at what i was looking at it was red then changed to orange it kinda looked like a orb so i began to film it.it was kind of starlike at times and was quiet and made no noise like a airplane would i did make reference to it being a flying saucer because when i was filming it to the naked eye it kind of looked like a saucer when it passed over us and the ground had a kind of wierd vibration and the dogs in my nieghborhood were all barking it was very strange.after the object passed i remember thinking wow!i felt like it was a gift to get to see somthing like this and to film it was a plus! thank you *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg) *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg)
Object Shape: Circle, Diamond, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Other
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Covington
There were no other sightings in Covington on or around October 30th 2010
Summary: It was a reddish Orange star looking object that was moving fast.
